Name: Brigand's Sword
Description: The sharp sword dropped by Brigands is often used to create Battle Imagines.
Description$english: The sharp sword dropped by Brigands is often used to create Battle Imagines.
Description2$english: The blades used by Brigands, although not as sharp as standard weapons, are lightweight and easy to handle. Even a swordsmanship idiot can easily get the hang of it.
